net.proteusframework.core.metric

Class PointMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.metric.Metric
      • net.proteusframework.core.metric.PointMetric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public final class PointMetric
extends Metric
    A PointMetric instance defines the value of the Metric as a number of Points. A Point is 1/72 inch.
    Author:
    Yongjia Ni (yni@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
